name: Onyxcoin
description: Onyx Protocol, a decentralized platform that facilitates an all-in-1 peer-to-peer lending protocol! The Onyx Protocol represents a significant step towards supporting abroader segment of the digital assets, such as Ether (ETH), ERC-20 tokens, ERC-721 tokens, and ERC-1155 tokens. These can be supplied or borrowed through an aggregated and unified balance, supported by non-custodial custody via decentralized smart contracts.
